member.name: ICategorizer.CompareCategory
member.summary: Determines the relative order of two items in their item identifier lists, and hence in the UI.
member.param: A flag that specifies how the comparison should be performed. The parameter should be one of the values in .
A DWORD that specifies the first category identifier to use in the comparison.
A DWORD that specifies the second category identifier to use in the comparison.
member.returns: If this method is successful, the CODE field of the HRESULT contains a value that specifies the outcome of the comparison, otherwise it returns a COM error code.

member.name: ICategorizer.GetCategory
member.summary: Gets a list of categories associated with a list of identifiers.
member.param: The number of items in an item identifier list array.
A pointer to an array of cidl item identifier list pointers.
When this method returns, contains a pointer to an array of cidl category identifiers.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ICategorizer.GetCategoryInfo
member.summary: Gets information about a category, such as the default display and the text to display in the UI.
member.param: A DWORD that specifies a category identifier.
When this method returns, contains a pointer to a structure that contains the category information.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ICategorizer.GetDescription
member.summary: Gets the name of a categorizer, such as Group By Device Type, that can be displayed in the UI.
member.param: When this method returns, contains a pointer to a string of length cch that contains the categorizer name.
The number of characters in the pszDesc buffer.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
